nodes.text: Calm Mind was a Force-sensitive male Esh-kha who imprisoned along with the rest of his species in the Tomb on Belsavis until the invasion of Belsavis during the Galactic War. A high-ranking warrior who had earned a name of his own, Calm Mind was among the elite Esh-kha warriors who spearheaded an incursion into the Rakata machine caves in order to shut down the Rakata stasis generators, but was slain by Galactic Republic forces.
Calm Mind is one of the five targets of "Esh-kha Elite", the bonus mission accompanying the Republic Heroic mission "The Stasis Generator" on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
